activity-ids.description: The `Activities` the check-in list is for. Format: An array of `Activity` IDs.

expires-at.description: The time at which the check-in list should no longer be accessible or null for no expiry.

question-ids.description: The `Questions` to show attendees' answers to on the check-in list. Format: An array of `Question` IDs.

release-ids.description: The `Releases` the check-in list is for. Format: An array of `Release` IDs.

show-company-name.description: Show the attendees' company name on the check-in list.

show-email.description: Show the attendees' email address on the check-in list.

show-phone-number.description: Show the attendees' phone number on the check-in list.
